Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of
becoming a Super Attack
*For 1 turn from the character's entry turn*
- Guards all attacks
*Per "Super Bosses" Category ally on the team*
- Damage reduction rate 6%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 30%)
*Before attacking*
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Launches an additional attack
*Every time the character performs 5 or more attacks in
battle*
- Launches an additional Super Attack (up to once within a
turn)
*Every time the character performs 10 or more attacks in
battle*
- Launches an additional Super Attack (up to once within a
turn)
*For every attack performed*
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} within the turn
*After receiving an attack*
- "Super Bosses" Category allies' Ki +2
*When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack*
- Great chance of nullifying it

Leader Skill.Name: Mastery of the Power of Rage

5188.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes immense damage to enemy

Active Skill.Name: Time Rift of Wrath
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Creates the Domain "City (Future) (Rift in Time)", 
raises "Super Bosses" Category allies' Ki by 2 
and creates the character's clones for 4 turns
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when all allies attacking 
in the same turn are "Super Bosses" Category 
characters starting from the 4th turn from 
the start of battle, or starting from the 6th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)
